title: FS: T202 McBride/Milan Shoeless Joe Jackson SGC 5 SOLD
author: Moonlight Graham

posts.post_title: FS: T202 McBride/Milan Shoeless Joe Jackson SGC 5 SOLD
posts.post_content:
Another T202 for sale featuring Shoeless Joe! And confirmed as such by the curator of the Shoeless Joe Museum. This is a nice example. The price is SOLD delivered. Thanks for looking at my sale.

Joe K

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=438501&d=1612225187[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=438502&d=1612225197[/IMG]

An interesting call. I wonder if you or anyone else on the board has any provenance like the newspaper article that highlighted Joe getting thrown out at third base on the Tannehill & Lord card? Just judging by appearances, I'd say the subject is too short, has too much dark hair, ears that are not floppy enough, and a face that doesn't match Joe's. Just my call here.
